ValidationRule.description: CSO checks NRC_Reminder field it's not possible to edit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(NRC_Reminder__c), PRIORVALUE(NRC_Reminder__c) = true,$Profile.Name != 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name != 'DeniedPartyScreeningAPIUser',$Profile.Name != 'API DATA LOAD',$Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation',$Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ',$Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration',$Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User',$Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration',$Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration (US)',$Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator',$Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE',$User.Id !='005300000042rPL',$User.Id != '005a0000007vvzm',$User.Id !='005300000041m9d')
